BiblePublication.comment: Has "hoops" instead of "hooks" used in the construction of the tabernacle
14 minor editions in the first three years
Famous error in Matthew 26:36
Exodus 20 Thou shalt (not) commit adultery
Printer Robert Barker fined 300 pounds
1 Corinthians 6:9 The unrighteous shall (not) inherit the Kingdom of God
"Sin on more" in John 5:14
Luke 20 title is "The Parable of the Vinegar"
Philip rather than Peter denied the Lord three times
Mark 7:27 Let the children first be killed (filled)
Hebrews 9:14 Purge your conscience from good (dead) works
1 Timothy 2:9 Women are to adorn themselves in modern (modest) apparel
